article.headline: UT-Chattanooga 74, Appalachian St. 49
article.story: BOONE, N.C. (AP) -- Alphonso Pugh scored 15 points and Ashley Champion and Chris Brown added 13 each to lead Chattanooga to a 74-49 win Saturday over Appalachian State. Ray Trowell added 11 points and Mindaugas Katelynas scored 10 for the Mocs (16-9, 9-5 Southern Conference). Herbert Jones and Noah Brown each scored nine for Appalachian State (9-18, 4-10). Chattanooga led the entire game, jumping out to a quick 11-3 lead, then finishing the half with a 12-1 run that gave them a 39-20 lead at the break. The Mocs led by as much as 63-30 with 10 minutes remaining.
